name: Frogger (itch) (x00F)
description:
Hop your way across the road and lake and get your frogs safe at the end of the river! This is a recreation of Frogger by Konami.

NOTE: PC Only

Controls:

Move Up: W / Up Arrow

Move Down: S / Down Arrow

Move Left: A / Left Arrow

Move Right: D / Right Arrow

Check out Zigurous and his tutorials!

Zigurous - YouTube
